subject: SQ pro shifter
description_text:
Hello

I ordered the SQ pro shifter through you from Amazon. Here is my order
number

112-1658015-1975468

I have only had the shifter since Sept 19th with daily use. The shifter no
longer returns smoothly from the reverse downshift position. Returns just
from up shift. Everything else works as it should. Still will down shift
but will not return to neutral position

conversations.body_text: Hi Juantaco Sevilla,  Please try adjusting the nuts on both sides according to the manual to see if that resolves the issue. Also, check whether the internal coil spring is damaged or deformed. If there is any problem, we’ll send you a new replacement spring free of charge.

Ok thank you. I will dismount and look over everything. Much appreciated.
Will reach out with results or questions.

On Fri, Oct 17, 2025, 7:18 PM service@simsonn.com

I was able to adjust the tension with the side bolts as manual suggested
but it is still sticking from the down shift position. I have a min video
but it exceeds the size I can send
Hi Juantaco Sevilla,  You can send us the link via Google Drive and please make sure that the access permission is properly set so we can view it.

Did the video send in drive folder ?

On Sun, Oct 19, 2025, 6:31 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Juantaco Sevilla,  ​Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you a new spring to correct the return force, and also provide a video guide to help you complete the replacement.

Jonathan Sevilla

112-1658015-1975468

520 S KELSEY ST APT 16
MONROE, WA 98272

On Thu, Oct 23, 2025, 3:47 AM service@simsonn.com

Jonathan Sevilla  425 583 6848

112-1658015-1975468

520 S KELSEY ST APT 16
MONROE, WA 98272

I never got my replacement parts!

On Thu, Dec 18, 2025, 1:56 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Juantaco Sevilla,  Sorry for it, we will reship it today.

Not sure what's going on but I still don't have parts to fix my shifter.

More and more people that I know seem to have this same problem. I'm sorry
to say but  I have to post a review on this.

On Sun, Dec 21, 2025, 11:25 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Juantaco Sevilla,  Here is the tracking number for the replacement: JSELN2202319834YQ,   the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS, you can track it via https://www.17track.net/en
